attributes.action: Call a General Election as soon as CoVid is behind us.
attributes.additional_details: As Boris Johnson's Government was elected primarily to 'Get Brexit Done', a new election should be declared due to the fact that Brexit's been taken care of however as CoVid's still an issue this would need to wait until that's been taken care of.
attributes.background: Dissolve the Government to call a General Election based on a wide-array of issues than just the Brexit process.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074

Form Cross Party Emergency Government to deal with Covid 19 then GE with PR
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331650
